channel.title: Fafadia Tech's Official Blog
channel.description: Fafadia Tech is a Mumbai based Startup focusing on open source technologies like Python, PHP and Linux. We also work on Big Data, Machine Learning and Natural Language Process. Our team is currently 18+ people strong. We've been in business since 2009. This blog is collection of our writing, experiments and thoughts. In Python we specially like Django, Flask and Tornado frameworks. For frontend we use Bootstrap and AngularJS. We've developed few Android and iOS Applications. Till date we've successfull completed 60+ projects in Health Care, eCommerce and Finance.

item.title: Exciting times to do Natural Language Processing
